text: Holes is a 2003 American adventure comedy-drama movie based on novel Holes. It has Shia LaBeouf in the lead role of Stanley Yelnats. Also in the movie are Sigourney Weaver, Jon Voight, Patricia Arquette, Tim Blake Nelson, Eartha Kitt, Dul√© Hill, Rick Fox, and Henry Winkler as Stanley Yelnats III. The movie was produced by Walden Media and released by Walt Disney Pictures. Holes made $16,300,155 in its opening weekend. It was #2 at the box office. Number 1 was Anger Management. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2003 comedy- drama movies Category:2003 adventure movies Category:2000s prison movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American prison movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1890s Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Multilingual movies Category:Prison comedy movies Category:Prison drama movies Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Andrew Davis
title: Holes (movie)
